fact_list.fact_text: Lots demarcated in red are reserved for Season Parking Ticket Holders.
Lots demarcated in white are for car parks outside the Restricted Zone.
Coupon parking is allowed in lots demarcated in white.
Lots demarcated in red and white (bi-coloured) are reserved for Season Parking Ticket Holders.
Coupon parking is allowed during restricted hours in lots demarcated in red and white (bi-coloured).
Lots demarcated in yellow are for car parks within the Restricted Zone.
Coupon parking is allowed in lots demarcated in yellow.
Higher parking charges apply during certain hours for lots demarcated in yellow.
